languages.text: While the enemy is in this webber’s web they take 10 toxic damage and gain stack of Melting at the beginning of each turn. Melting remains until the end of battle.

traits.locale_text: While the enemy is in this webber’s web they take 10 toxic damage and gain stack of Melting at the beginning of each turn. Melting remains until the end of battle.

languages.text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, targets {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} by this webber suffer 10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Both effects last until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Цели, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженные{/g} этим сетеметом, в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} получают 10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g} и +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}плавления{/g}. Оба эффекта длятся до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: At the start of their turn, targets immobilised by this webber suffer 10 toxic damage and +1 stack of melting. Melting lasts until the end of combat.

At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, targets {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} by this webber suffer 10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Both effects last until the end of combat.

At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, targets {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} by this webber suffer 10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Both effects last until the end of combat.

At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, targets {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} by this webber suffer 10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Both effects last until the end of combat.

languages.text: Bu ağdolayanın {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} ettiği hedefler, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turları{/g} başladığında 10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toksik hasara{/g} ve +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}erime{/g} birikimine maruz kalır. İki etki de çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, targets {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} by this webber suffer 10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Both effects last until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Bu ağdolayanın felç ettiği hedefler, turları başladığında 10 toksik hasara ve +1 erime birikimine maruz kalır. İki etki de çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
Bu ağdolayanın felç ettiği hedefler, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turları{/g} başladığında 10 toksik hasara ve +1 erime birikimine maruz kalır. İki etki de çatışma sonuna dek sürer.

languages.text: Al comienzo de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g} por este lanzarredes sufren 10 puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g} y +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}derretimiento{/g}. Ambos efectos duran hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, targets {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} by this webber suffer 10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Both effects last until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Al comienzo de su turno, los objetivos inmovilizados por este lanzarredes sufren 10 puntos de daño tóxico y +1 acumulación de derretimiento. Ambos efectos duran hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: 被这把捕网枪{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}的目标{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，受到10点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}，同时获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}熔化{/g}效果。这两种效果都会持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, targets {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} by this webber suffer 10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Both effects last until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 被这把捕网枪{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}的目标{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，受到10点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}，同时获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}熔化{/g}效果。这两种效果都会持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Au début de leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g} par ce lance-toile subissent 10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g} et reçoivent +1 cumul de {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Fusion{/g}. Les deux effets durent jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, targets {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} by this webber suffer 10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Both effects last until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Au début de leur tour, les cibles immobilisées par ce lance-toile subissent 10 points de dégâts toxiques et reçoivent +1 cumul de Fusion. Les deux effets durent jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、このウェバーによって{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}のターゲットは10の{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒性ダメージ{/g}と+1スタックの{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}溶解{/g}を受ける。戦闘終了まで両方の効果が継続する。
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, targets {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} by this webber suffer 10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Both effects last until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: ターン開始時、このウェバーによって移動不可のターゲットは10の毒性ダメージと+1スタックの溶解を受ける。戦闘終了まで両方の効果が継続する。
ターン開始時、このウェバーによって移動不可のターゲットは10の毒性ダメージと+1スタックの溶解を受ける。戦闘終了まで両方の効果が継続する。

languages.text: Zu Beginn ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} von diesem Weber {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmte{/g} Ziele erleiden 10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g} und werden mit +1 Stapel "{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Schmelzen{/g}" belegt. Beide Effekte dauern bis zum Ende des Kampfes an.
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, targets {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} by this webber suffer 10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Both effects last until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn ihrer Runde von diesem Weber gelähmte Ziele erleiden 10 Giftschaden und werden mit +1 Stapel "Schmelzen" belegt. Beide Effekte dauern bis zum Ende des Kampfes an.

languages.text: Цели, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженные{/g} этим сетеметом, в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} получают 10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g} и +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}плавления{/g}. Оба эффекта длятся до конца боя.
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, targets {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} by this webber suffer 10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Both effects last until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Цели, обездвиженные этим сетеметом, в начале своего хода получают 10 токсичного урона и +1 уровень плавления. Оба эффекта длятся до конца боя.
Цели, обездвиженные этим сетеметом, в начале своего хода получают 10 токсичного урона и +1 уровень плавления. Оба эффекта длятся до конца боя.
